name: LogRhythm Case API Integration with Supporting Playbooks and Automations
description:
Provides enhanced capabilities for dealing with LogRhythm Cases and Alarms. In addition to optionally fetching Cases from a LogRhythm instance, the Integration provides the following commands:

lr-add-alarms-to-case Adds the specified alarms to the specified case.

lr-add-case-note Adds note evidence to a Case.

lr-create-case Creates a Case in LogRhythm

lr-drilldown-on Drills down on an alarm.

lr-update-case-status Update the status of a case by sending the numerical status code.

lr-update-case-summary Updates the case summary.

Pack includes supporting Playbooks and Automations, along with a script for linking similar Incidents and passing the underlying alarms back to LR as Case evidence.
author: Tony Steckman
